title: icosonar
author: icosonar
content: Need Partner/ Partners for an Upcoming Crypto Project.- Must Criteria1. Interested in revealing true identity amongst Partners2. Have proven experience [I can provide my experience proof on Top Rated Freelance platform]- Product1. A combination of https://listingspy.net/, https://vetterplatform.app/crowdx and https://coinsniper.net/ - Partner requirements1. Marketing Partner2. Content Partner3. AMA PartnerInterested person can DM me.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: You're asking too much on criteria and requirements what about the project and your capability is it worth getting in your project, up until now when your reputation is in question. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5294727.msg55716175#msg55716175, you prefer not to reveal your profile on your so-called freelance platform and what about this in your signature QuoteWe have 350+ 5* Rated Reviews on Freelance Platform.DM me for the Link of Freelance platform.Ignore the Freeloaders' (Fuckers') fake Reviews!is there something you are hiding so we can verify if your project is really legit, if it is we'll more than willing to support it.

comments.author: jamyr
comments.body: Quote from: icosonar on May 28, 2022, 07:37:00 AMNeed Partner/ Partners for an Upcoming Crypto Project.- Must Criteria1. Interested in revealing true identity amongst Partners2. Have proven experience [I can provide my experience proof on Top Rated Freelance platform]- Product1. AMA PartnerInterested person can DM me.For marketing gig/partnership, do you really need to get their rl identity? I believe that wont affect marketing at all.

comments.author: icosonar
comments.body: That was 2020. Several places Crypto banned and so much FUD. This is 2022.
